description: {"blocks":[{"key":"a7jpr","text":"This liquid-liquid extraction for cells enables thesimultaneous generation of lipidomics and metabolomics samples for HILIC and C18 chromatography.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"4bflh","text":"This extraction should be performed in a fume hood.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We are still developing and optimizing this protocol

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"cq5mv","text":"Cells should arrive pelleted and frozen from collaborator ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"78qen","text":"Using wide-mouth pipette wash pellet with 500uL 150 mM ammonium acetate (25x aspirations)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"e0un2","text":"Centrifuge @ 200 g for 5 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"b6fkn","text":"Remove supernatant","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bs7jr","text":"Repeat steps 2-4 a second time","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ck7cp","text":"Add 4-6 non-sterile 2.3mm stainless steel beads to the tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6em1v","text":"Dispense 225 ul of ice-cold Methanol at -20 deg C containing 1.5% iSTD “SPLASH” mix into extraction tube 1.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7bjhs","text":"Seal the sample tube and place it in the bead beater at an amplitude 20 Hz for 15 minutes to homogenize the sample \u0026 extract the metabolites.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2trtm","text":"Close the tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3rvv6","text":"Vortex extraction tube 1 for 10 seconds.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"758ri","text":"Open extraction tube 1 and dispense 750ul of ice-cold MTBE.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"99i61","text":"Close extraction tube 1 and vortex for 10s.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1f5uk","text":"Shake extraction tube 1 for 6 min at 4 deg C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3dcd2","text":"Open extraction tube 1 and dispense 188 ul of LC-MS grade water containing the 18 HILIC iSTDs at 1/3rd of their normal concentration as defined in the HILIC extraction SOP except CUDA.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"d3d8k","text":"Close extraction tube 1 and vortex it for 20 seconds","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ems6v","text":"Centrifuge extraction tube 1 for 2 min at 14,000xg.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8e4vu","text":"Open extraction tube 1 and transfer 700ul of the upper phase into a single 700ul tubetwo new separate tubes(350ul/ tube);  henceforth referred to as (Lipidomics tube 1) and (Lipidomics tube 2).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"brm3b","text":"Transfer 250ul of the bottom phase from extraction tube 1 into a new single-tube hereafter referred to as (Hilic tube 1).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1bq5v","text":"Centrivap Lipidomics tube 1, and Hilic tube 1 at room temperature until dry.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cqrtl","text":"Reconstitute Lipidomics tube 1 in 120 ul of Methanol containing CUDA istd and close the tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4pdkv","text":"Perform lipid cleanup on HILIC tube 1:  Add 500uL of 1:1 ACN:Water and vortex for 20s","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"913ck","text":"Centrifuge at 14,000 g for 2 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2s7tr","text":"Transfer supernatant to a new tube and dry down","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6kkec","text":"Reconstitute HILIC tube 1 in 60ul of ACN:H2O (4:1 v/v) containing CUDA and close the tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1qvjh","text":"Sonicate Lipidomics tube 1 and Hilic tube 1 at room temperature for 5 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8bhpd","text":"Centrifuge Lipidomics tube 1 and Hilic tube 1 at 14,000xg for 2 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2i12j","text":"Open lipidomics tube 1, transfer equal fractions of the extract into two separate amber glass vials with micro-inserts, hereafter referred to as (lipidomics vial 1 pos) and (lipidomics vial 1 neg), and close the vials.a","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bktur","text":"Open Hilic tube 1 and transfer the extract into an amber glass vial with a micro-insert, hereafter referred to as (Hilic vial) and close the vial.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8n7pc","text":"Analyze the samples via UHPLC–Orbitrap as follows.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Integrated Extraction for Cells
